item.title: 鲍威尔称关键资本规则变化可能有助于国债市场
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周二表示，对一项关键资本缓冲的潜在修改应能加强银行作为美国国债市场中介机构的作用。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said Tuesday that potential changes to a key capital buffer should bolster banks’ roles as intermediaries in the US Treasuries market.】

item.title: 芯片设计商 Ambarella 探索潜在出售机会
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，芯片设计公司 Ambarella Inc.【原文：Chip design company Ambarella Inc. is considering options including a potential sale, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贝利称英国央行出售债券的决定 "今年更有趣
item.description: 英格兰银行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）表示，英格兰银行即将做出的削减政府债券投资组合的年度决定 "今年将更加有趣"。【原文：The Bank of England’s looming annual decision on reducing its government bond portfolio will be “more interesting this year,” according to Governor Andrew Bailey.】

item.title: 中国财富基金终止 10 亿美元私募股权交易
item.description: 中国主权财富基金取消了出售 10 亿美元美国基金股权的计划，这些股权与私募股权投资领域的一些大公司有关。【原文：China’s sovereign wealth fund has pulled its planned sale of $1 billion in US fund stakes tied to some of the biggest names in private equity.】

item.title: 特朗普称中国可购买伊朗石油，减轻对伊朗的压力
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，中国可以继续从伊朗购买石油，这突然减轻了美国对这个中东国家经济命脉施加的 "最大压力"。【原文：President Donald Trump said China can continue to purchase oil from Iran, abruptly easing the “maximum pressure” the US had been applying to the Middle Eastern country’s economic lifeblood.】

item.title: 美国宣布东南部地区进入电力紧急状态，高温给电网带来压力
item.description: 特朗普政府宣布美国东南部地区进入电力紧急状态，因为酷热的热浪使全国各地的电网不堪重负。【原文：The Trump administration has declared a power emergency in the US Southeast as a blistering heat wave strains grids across the country.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚债券投资者准备好迎接古斯塔沃-彼得罗执政的最后一年
item.description: 在古斯塔沃-佩特洛（Gustavo Petro）总统任期的最后阶段，哥伦比亚美元债券的投资者正卯足了劲，希望明年的大选能缓解多年来的财政和政治失误。【原文：Investors in Colombia’s dollar bonds are digging in for the final stretch of Gustavo Petro’s presidency, hoping that next year’s election will bring relief after years of fiscal and political missteps.】

item.title: 中东石油流量在周一跳水后将反弹
item.description: 周一，波斯湾的石油流出量急剧下降，这表明一些业主对安全局势保持警惕，但石油流出量有望大幅恢复。【原文：The flow of oil out of the Persian Gulf plunged on Monday — a sign that some owners have have been wary of the security situation — but are on course to recover sharply.】

item.title: 德国汽车零部件销售商 Autodoc 推迟法兰克福首次公开募股
item.description: 德国汽车零部件零售商 Autodoc SE 周二推迟了在法兰克福的首次公开募股，但未说明原因。【原文：German car parts retailer Autodoc SE postponed its Frankfurt initial public offering on Tuesday, without stating a reason.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长莱恩称通货紧缩进程 "基本完成
item.description: 欧洲中央银行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）表示，尽管仍有一些地区存在物价上涨压力，但将通胀率拉回 2% 的进程已接近尾声。【原文：European Central Bank Chief Economist Philip Lane said the process of bringing inflation back to 2% is almost over, despite some pockets of elevated price pressures remaining.】

item.title: 英国央行拉姆斯登警告劳动力市场疲软可能导致通胀率低于 2
item.description: 英格兰银行副行长戴夫-拉姆斯登（Dave Ramsden）表示，由于担心就业率急剧下降会导致通胀率低于 2% 的目标，他上周投票决定将利率下调四分之一个百分点。【原文：Bank of England Deputy Governor Dave Ramsden said he voted to cut rates by a quarter point last week over fears of a sharp fall in employment that would drive inflation below its 2% target.】

item.title: 索拉纳财政公司 Upexi 在内幕交易申报后下跌 62
item.description: Upexi Inc. 在提交允许投资者出售这家由消费品牌公司转变为加密货币积累商的普通股的注册声明后，暴跌高达 62%。【原文：Upexi Inc. tumbled as much as 62% following the filing of a registration statement to allow investors to sell common shares in the consumer brands company turned cryptocurrency accumulator.】

item.title: 对经济的广泛担忧导致美国消费者信心下降
item.description: 由于担心贸易政策导致经济、劳动力市场和收入前景恶化，6 月份美国消费者信心意外下降。【原文：US consumer confidence unexpectedly declined in June on concerns about prospects for the economy, labor market and incomes due to trade policy.】

item.title: 全国最优秀的黑客之一是一个人工智能机器人
item.description:
Xbow 是一家初创公司，其开发的黑客攻击安全工具在业界享有盛誉，该公司正在筹集 7500 万美元

。【原文：

Xbow, the startup behind a highly ranked hacking security tool, is raising $75 million

】

item.title: 特朗普芯片关税威胁引发汽车业和科技界反弹
item.description: 对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提出的对进口半导体征收关税的想法，根据对150多条公众意见的审查，其反弹被证明是广泛而深刻的，从汽车公司和造船厂到科技行业和加密货币爱好者都有涉及。【原文：Blowback to President Donald Trump’s idea of tariffs on imported semiconductors is proving to be broad and deep, stretching from auto companies and boat makers to the technology industry and crypto enthusiasts, according to a review of more than 150 public comments on the proposal.】

item.title: 空域关闭后，滞留多哈的旅行者寻找出路
item.description: 在伊朗空袭卡塔尔几小时后，多哈当局重新开放了世界上最繁忙的航空枢纽之一的领空。【原文：A few hours after an Iranian air strike on Qatar, authorities in Doha reopened the airspace over one of the busiest aviation hubs in the world.】

item.title: 泰国中央银行行长一职的两名候选人入围名单
item.description: 泰国已为央行行长一职确定了两名入围候选人名单，投资者密切关注着这一任命，希望从中找到东南亚国家未来货币政策轨迹的线索。【原文：Thailand has shortlisted two candidates for the role of central bank governor, an appointment keenly watched by investors for clues to the Southeast Asian nation’s future monetary policy trajectory.】

item.title: 微软计划对 Xbox 游戏部门进行大规模裁员
item.description:
视频游戏部门的最新一轮裁员预计将于下周进行

。【原文：

The video-game division’s latest round of layoffs is expected next week

】

item.title: 嘉年华上调盈利展望，邮轮游客不受波动影响
item.description: 由于邮轮需求摆脱了动荡的经济和地缘政治背景，嘉年华集团（Carnival Corp.【原文：Carnival Corp. shares jumped after it raised its full-year profit outlook as cruise demand has shrugged off the volatile economic and geopolitical backdrop.】

item.title: 特朗普敦促以色列与伊朗停战，美国股市扩大涨幅
item.description: 美国股市在周二交易开始时跳涨，因为唐纳德-特朗普总统确认了他对以色列和伊朗之间停战的信心，敦促两国遵守停火协议。【原文：US equities jumped at the start of Tuesday trading as President Donald Trump affirmed his confidence in a truce between Israel and Iran, urging both countries to adhere to a ceasefire agreement.】

item.title: 印度航空安全审计发现航空公司和枢纽站存在多处漏洞
item.description: 印度航空安全监管机构在印度航空公司 AI171 号航班失事后下令对航空公司和机场进行审计，发现了多处飞机维护失误，包括反复出现的缺陷，表明监控和纠正不力。【原文：India’s aviation safety regulator found multiple aircraft-maintenance lapses in an audit of airlines and airports ordered after the crash of Air India flight AI171, including recurring defects that indicate inadequate monitoring and correction.】

item.title: Circle 暴涨 750% 引发关于稳定币支付的争论
item.description: 对美国稳定币的乐观情绪推动 Circle Internet Group 公司股价飙升，这让投资者和市场观察人士都想知道，这家新上市的公司短期内还能有多大的上升空间。【原文：A surge in shares of Circle Internet Group Inc., lifted by a wave of optimism about US stablecoins, has investors and market-watchers alike wondering just how much upside could be left in the near-term for the newly publicly-traded company.】

item.title: 中东局势动荡不安，摩洛哥暂停降息
item.description: 摩洛哥暂停了罕见的货币宽松周期，选择了谨慎行事，即使以色列和伊朗暂时休战似乎缓解了人们对消费价格可能飙升的直接担忧。【原文：Morocco paused a rare monetary-easing cycle, opting for caution even as a tentative Israel-Iran truce appeared to allay immediate concerns over a potential spike in consumer prices.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔在美国众议院就货币政策作证
item.description: 2 月，在华盛顿举行的参议院银行、住房和城市事务委员会听证会上，美国联邦储备委员会主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔。摄影师：Tierney L. Cross/Bloomberg【原文：Jerome Powell, chairman of the US Federal Reserve, during a Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs Committee hearing in Washington in February. Photographer: Tierney L. Cross/Bloomberg】

item.title: 美联储哈马克称政策可能会搁置相当长一段时间
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长贝丝-哈马克（Beth Hammack）表示，利率只是适度限制，官员们可能会在一段时间内保持借贷成本稳定。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Beth Hammack said that interest rates are only modestly restrictive and that officials may hold borrowing costs steady for some time.】

item.title: 伊丽莎白-沃伦抨击监管机构可能修改银行杠杆率规则
item.description: 美国参议员伊丽莎白-沃伦（Elizabeth Warren）在监管机构本周召开会议之前批评了对一项关键银行资本缓冲的潜在改革，称该规则是促进金融稳定的 "关键保障"。【原文：US Senator Elizabeth Warren criticized potential reforms to a key bank capital buffer ahead of regulators’ meetings this week, saying the rule is a “critical safeguard” that promotes financial stability.】

item.title: 中东停战令风险情绪回落，天然气算法回调
item.description: 自美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布以色列与伊朗停火以来，依靠趋势跟踪算法的交易商正从欧洲天然气市场撤出，加剧了市场上的风险情绪。【原文：Traders relying on trend-following algorithms are pulling back from the European gas market, exacerbating the risk-off mood in play since US President Donald Trump announced a ceasefire between Israel and Iran.】

item.title: EQB 称首席执行官安德鲁-摩尔已去世，将任命临时领导人
item.description: EQB Inc.首席执行官安德鲁-摩尔（Andrew Moor）于上周末意外去世，享年 65 岁。该公司将于周二晚些时候任命一位临时领导人。【原文：EQB Inc. Chief Executive Officer Andrew Moor died unexpectedly at the age of 65 over the weekend, the company said. It will name an interim leader later Tuesday.】

item.title: 德意志银行为新兴市场团队挖来麦格理策略师
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）已聘请麦格理资产管理公司（Macquarie Asset Management）的主权债务策略师布鲁诺-罗瓦伊（Bruno Rovai），这是德意志银行拓展新兴市场业务的最新举措。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG has hired Macquarie Asset Management’s sovereign debt strategist Bruno Rovai, according to a person familiar with the matter, the latest move to expand its emerging-market business.】

item.title: 切尼尔公司将投资 29 亿美元扩建得克萨斯州天然气出口工厂
item.description: 液化天然气出口商切尼尔能源公司（Cheniere Energy Inc.【原文：Liquefied natural gas exporter Cheniere Energy Inc. plans to spend $2.9 billion on the next expansion trains at its Texas facility in Corpus Christi.】
